s.text: If the process of slaughter becomes a savage yahoo spectacle, then we are indeed barbaric.
If the process of slaughter becomes a savage yahoo spectacle, then we are indeed barbaric.

I know the Weinstein boys probably brokered the best possible compromise, and that it's a classic Sun Su tactic to allow the enemy to withdraw without loss of face, but, for me, it's a "don't ask, don't tell" solution.
